long_description: The rock-friendly Patagonia Back Step shorts will take you where you want to climb, from the granite walls of the Stawamus Chief in British Columbia to a sandstone crack at Indian Creek, Utah. Durable hemp/organic cotton blend stands up to regular encounters with rough rocks. 2 front slash pockets and a rear welt pocket stash your essentials. Patagonia Back Step shorts have a regular fit.
short_description: The rock-friendly Patagonia Back Step shorts will take you where you want to climb, from the granite walls of the Stawamus Chief in British Columbia to a sandstone crack at Indian Creek, Utah.
